title: New Star Wars Series in the Works From Lost EP Carlton Cuse
description: The Star Wars franchise may have found its new showrunner in a Lost alum — and a new TV show might not be so far, far away. A new Star Wars series is in the works from Lost executive producer Carlton Cuse, our sister site Variety confirms. (The InSneider first reported the news.) Cuse is joined […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Ghosts’ Asher Grodman Explains Trevor’s The Cutting Edge Obsession
description: The spirits on Ghosts love their TV time, watching everything from Survivor and Selling Sunset to fictional programs like the reality series It’s Getting Hot in Here and the Succession-esque Night Sugar. But if Trevor had his way, he and his pals would only be watching one thing, all the time: The Cutting Edge. Over […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Extracted Pulls Off Unexpected (and Underwhelming) Finale, Proving the Series Still Needs Work
description: Extracted pulls off a shocking finale with unexpected winner. But does the format still work? We discuss it here! The post Extracted Pulls Off Unexpected (and Underwhelming) Finale, Proving the Series Still Needs Work appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jasmine Blu

title: Why CBS’s Ghosts Absolutely Deserved To Be Renewed For Two More Seasons
description: CBS recently renewed the hilarious show Ghosts for two more seasons and TV Fanatic knows exactly why the network is taking that chance. The post Why CBS’s Ghosts Absolutely Deserved To Be Renewed For Two More Seasons appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Joshua Pleming
